title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: So many emotions, moods, and visions can flood your mind today that they interrupt your work performance. You may need to take frequent breaks to meditate or just tune into your favorite playlist. Stick to aspects of any task that allow you to be imaginative, intuitive, or nurturing. Your empathy for coworkers and customers alike is a valuable asset. But be careful as unscrupulous folks can easily pluck your heartstrings and end up playing you like a violin. Your current energy is best for beautifully coloring within the lines rather than setting hard boundaries of your own. Your creativity is your saving grace. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
